markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs=""
>
[The Tyrant](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2516)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 78</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

As long as you have _The Tyrant_ invested, you gain a +2 item bonus to [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks made to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53). This bonus increases to +3 if you are at least 17th level.

<document level="2" id="action-2062" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: The Tyrant
